name: Euphoria Brighter Than A Comet: KINETIC VERSION
name_original: Euphoria Brighter Than A Comet: KINETIC VERSION
description:
HEADS UP!  I HAVEN'T BEEN ABLE TO FULLY TEST THIS GAME YET!  As I'm still in recovery for pseudo-dementia, I only have access to a mobile phone, and access to a computer is rather limited, especially on weekends (when the jams I'm entering are wrapping up).  In case the game doesn't work on desktop, I'm including a .pdf of the story so that it can still be read. 

Beckj, a Plutonian on earth for beir orthiology degree, has been invited to a fraternity's Halloween party.  Can bey stay within humanity's expected gender roles, and navigate beir love for beir best Earth friend Aaron at the same time?  Or will bey let the mask slip--and find beautiful results?

This 18+ story contains: discussion of societal gender roles, and a sex scene.  The sex scene contains pet play, petting, and fingering.  The skip function may or may not be acive; I know it says that it is in the game but head's up, it might not be there.

Euphoria Brighter Than A Comet is a game I’m really excited to show you.  However, October was a very busy month for me, so I couldn’t finish the version of this project with more choices.  Because of that, I’m releasing this Kinetic Version, and will work on the Choice version for a future release.  If you don’t know, a kinetic text-based game is one with no choices or branching paths.

Please let me know what you think of this story!  I very much want to hear other people’s thoughts, so comments are very welcome!
